comments.body: Quote from: notscam420 on June 03, 2023, 02:47:42 AMThis account is a official account of NicNacCoin project was a USA project. according to nicnaccoin Twitter page Nicnac company is from San Diego, SA which is a place of USA. check the Twitter page - https://twitter.com/nicnaccoinBut now Nicnaccoin posting on Bengali local board for exchange merit to each other alt account.https://ninjastic.space/search?author=NicNacCoin&board=11 So you are saying someone must be from the same country to work on some remote project? I don't think theymos is from the same country as Satoshi, Cyrus, or other ex-admins and moderators. Anyone can be from any country and work on a remote project if they have skills. You should know why some projects hire team members from 3rd world countries. You can pay them way less compared to those who live in US or Canada. I am not here to say whether this account was bought/hacked or not. But, your point makes a little sense to no sense. I don't want to say anything about changed hands or not. I have seen many accounts hanging around, and it looks like those accounts were bought or hacked. But until you have some solid proof, You shouldn't accuse someone of doing wrong. Let's say someone is innocent, and I accused him of doing something just because I suspected him. If someone tags him, but he is innocent, I am the one to blame for the damage. This is just a bit of friendly advice and opinion.
